revised_title: Fossil Plants of the Coal-Measures: Myelopteris, Psaronius, and Kaloxylon
tldr: The author examines the organization and structure of fossil plants from the coal-measures, specifically Myelopteris, Psaronius, and Kaloxylon. They analyze the plant's anatomy, including its cells, vascular bundles, and gum-canals, and discuss its classification and relationship to other plants.
